Standardize a SingleCellExperiment

Helen Lindsay

2022-07-11

Source: vignettes/renameSingleCellExp.Rmd
renameSingleCellExp.Rmd

This vignette shows how to standardize the names of the antibody-derived tags in a CITE-seq experiment in SingleCellExperiment format.

To demonstrate, we will use the “cord_blood” dataset available in the package “SingleCellMultiModal”.

#library(SingleCellMultiModal)
#cord_blood <- CITEseq(DataType="cord_blood", modes="scADT_Counts",
#                      dry.run=FALSE, DataClass = "SingleCellExperiment")
#cord_blood

# May not need much renaming....
library("scRNAseq")
kotliarov <- KotliarovPBMCData(mode = "adt")
rownames(kotliarov)
##  [1] "AnnexinV_PROT"               "BTLA_PROT"                  
##  [3] "CD117_PROT"                  "CD123_PROT"                 
##  [5] "CD13_PROT"                   "CD133_PROT"                 
##  [7] "CD134_PROT"                  "CD137_PROT"
